Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.18008336]Virus:HIV:inhibition the cytopathic effects of HIV-1 infection in cultured human T-lymphoblast (CEM-SS) cells(EC50=130 nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism. Has anti-HIV activity.
Sequence Information.PTM: This is a cyclic peptide which may contain three disulfide bonds 5-21;9-23;14-28.

Literature.Title: Cycloviolins A-D, anti-HIV macrocyclic peptides from Leonia cymosa.
Literature.Author: Hallock YF, Sowder RC 2nd, Pannell LK, Hughes CB, Johnson DG, Gulakowski R, Cardellina JH 2nd, Boyd MR.

Literature.Title: Cyclotides as natural anti-HIV agents.
Literature.Author: Ireland DC, Wang CK, Wilson JA, Gustafson KR, Craik DJ.
